phrs.translation: n. 交换机；以太网交换机

sentences.sentence: Thanks to its Ethernet card, you can link straight into your network at the office.
sentences.translation: 多亏有它的以太网卡，你能在办公室直接连入网络。

sentences.sentence: You will have three Ethernet adapters.
Let's also configure an Ethernet card.
sentences.translation: 我们来配置一个以太网卡。
